column5: For those interested.....it's a VERY good article...  http://www.buffalonews.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20121010/WORLD/121019953/1002
Awwwwww Mongo gone he loved sheriff Bart!!
"Mongo only pawn, in game of life" a classic movie line...  He was great in Blazing Saddles and Victor Victoria, can't say I watched Webster lol
Remember Mr Karras & his wife Susan Clark from the movie "Porky's" but more his wife from the inspection scene in a rundown house from the movie.....
I've loved Blazing Saddles since I was little...Rest easy Alex...
He also played a character on an episode of MASH which was on yesterday. RIP Alex.
